subtitles.text: The story begins in the peaceful village of <VILLAGE_NAME>.
There lives Alex, a boy who believes he leads a normal life.
Under the care of Eldran, a wise elder who has looked after him since his parents died when he was little.
On the table, a letter awaits: his first mission.
Alex arrives, struggling as he carries a crate of fruit for Eldran.
Suddenly, something strange glows in the sky... a fireball is heading toward them.
Alex closes his eyes and screams "NOOO!", unknowingly unleashing a powerful magic.
His flame collides with the projectile, deflecting it completely.
Alex opens his eyes, astonished, not understanding what he has just done.
Eldran looks at him in awe: "Alex! It can't be... do you have magic?"
The ground trembles and a dark figure emerges amid smoke and fire: a demon.
Eldran shouts: "Alex! Use your magic, press X and defeat the demon."
